com.nitnelave.CreeperHeal.block

Interface Replaceable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreeperArmorStand, CreeperBanner, CreeperBlock, CreeperButton, CreeperHanging, CreeperStone

    public interface Replaceable
    Interface for replaceable items (blocks, paintings, ...).
    Author:
    nitnelave

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean drop(boolean forced)
      Drop the item on the ground.

      Get whether the block depends on another block.
      void remove()
      Remove the block from the world.
      boolean replace(boolean shouldDrop)
      Replace the block in the world.

    • Method Detail

      • replace

        boolean replace(boolean shouldDrop)
        Replace the block in the world. In case of a dependent item whose support is absent, the boolean shouldDrop determines whether the replacement is postponed or if the item should be dropped.
        Parameters:
        shouldDrop - If true, the item will drop, otherwise its replacement will be postponed.
        Returns:
        False if the replacement was postponed.

      • getBlock

        org.bukkit.block.Block getBlock()
        Get the block represented.
        Returns:
        The block represented.

      • getWorld

        org.bukkit.World getWorld()
        Get the world containing the block.
        Returns:
        The world containing the block.

      • getType

        org.bukkit.Material getType()
        Get the type id of the block represented.
        Returns:
        The type id of the block represented.

      • getAttachingFace

        org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getAttachingFace()
        Get the face the block is attached by. SELF if the block is not dependent.
        Returns:
        The blockFace the block is attached by, SELF if the block is not dependent.

      • getLocation

        org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
        Get the block's location.
        Returns:
        The block's location.

      • isDependent

        boolean isDependent()
        Get whether the block depends on another block.
        Returns:
        Whether the block depends on another block.

      • drop

        boolean drop(boolean forced)
        Drop the item on the ground.
        Parameters:
        forced - If false, the block is dropped only according to the drop chance in the config.
        Returns:
        True if the block was dropped.

      • remove

        void remove()
        Remove the block from the world.
